author: Aisha Al-Muslim
title: Some Advertisers Cut Ties With Fox News Host Laura Ingraham Over Parkland Comments
text:
Several companies have pulled their advertisements from Laura Ingraham’s Fox News program in response to boycott calls after she tweeted comments appearing to mock a survivor of the Parkland, Fla., high-school shooting.
Pet-food company Nutrish, online home-goods company Wayfair and travel website TripAdvisor said to The Wall Street Journal Thursday that they have decided to withdraw commercials from Ms. Ingraham’s evening news and opinion show, “The Ingraham Angle.”
